nodes.text: Located within the Unknown Regions, the nebula known as Kharmort's Miasma was the site of the Vagar Praxut system. The star system contained the planet Vagar Praxut, homeworld of the sentient Vagaari species.
Kharmort's Miasma was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square H-9.
